title: Hiroshima: blast effect, April 1946 [Silent]
creator_credit: United States. National Archives and Records Service
brief_description: Filmed eight months after the dropping of the first atomic bomb. Shows the extent of the devastation caused by the bomb. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
